flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
世界一　大きな　花びらで　獲物を
おびき寄せ　毒の　花粉を　浴びせかける。
動けなくなった　獲物を　捕まえて　食べる。

Vileplume has the world’s largest petals. They are used to
attract prey that are then doused with toxic spores. Once the
prey are immobilized, this Pokémon catches and devours them.

Vileplume ha i petali più grandi al mondo. Li usa per attirare
la preda per poi ricoprirla di spore velenose. Una volta
immobilizzata la preda, il Pokémon la cattura e la divora.

Vileplume tiene los mayores pétalos del mundo. Los usa para
atraer a sus presas y llenarlas de esporas tóxicas. Una vez
que ha inmovilizado a las víctimas, las atrapa y las devora.

Giflor hat die größten Blätter der Welt. Sie ziehen Beute an
und bestäuben sie mit giftigen Sporen. Wenn die Beute sich
nicht mehr rührt, fängt dieses Pokémon sie und frisst sie auf.

Rafflesia dispose des plus grands pétales du monde.
Il s’en sert pour attirer ses proies avant de les endormir
avec ses spores toxiques. Ce Pokémon n’a plus alors
qu’à attraper sa proie et à la manger.

세계에서 제일 큰 꽃잎으로 먹이를
유인하여 독 꽃가루를 끼얹는다.
움직이지 못하게 된 먹이를 잡아먹는다.

せかいいち　おおきな　はなびらで　えものを
おびきよせ　どくの　かふんを　あびせかける。
うごけなくなった　えものを　つかまえて　たべる。

毒花粉は　酷い　アレルギーを　起こす。
ジャングルで　美しい　花を　 つけても
うかつに　近寄らない　ほうが　いいよ。

Vileplume’s toxic pollen triggers atrocious allergy attacks.
That’s why it is advisable never to approach any attractive
flowers in a jungle, however pretty they may be.

Il polline velenoso di Vileplume scatena paurose reazioni
allergiche. Per questo motivo si consiglia di non avvicinarsi
mai a nessun fiore di bosco, per quanto bello possa essere.

El polen que contienen las esporas tóxicas de Vileplume causa
unos ataques de alergia muy agudos. Por eso, no es
aconsejable acercarse a ninguna flor selvática, por muy bonita
que sea.

Giflors giftige Pollen rufen böse allergische Anfälle hervor.
Deshalb ist es ratsam, sich keiner schönen Blume im
Dschungel zu nähern, so anziehend sie auch sein mag.

Le pollen toxique de Rafflesia déclenche d’affreuses réactions
allergiques. C’est pourquoi il est conseillé de ne jamais
s’approcher des jolies fleurs trouvées dans la jungle,
même lorsqu’elles sont magnifiques.

독 꽃가루는 심한 알레르기를 일으킨다.
정글에서 아름다운 꽃을 발견해도
섣불리 다가가지 않는 것이 좋다.

どくかふんは　ひどい　アレルギーを　おこす。
ジャングルで　うつくしい　はなを　 つけても
うかつに　ちかよらない　ほうが　いいよ。

世界一　大きな　花びらは
歩くたびに　揺れて　大量の
毒花粉を　ばらまいている。

It has the world’s largest petals. With every step,
the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

Ha i petali più grandi del mondo. Ad ogni suo passo,
i petali liberano fitte nubi di polline tossico.

Tiene los pétalos más grandes del mundo. Estos
expulsan densas nubes de polen tóxico al caminar.

Es besitzt die größten Blätter der Welt.
Bei jedem Schritt streut es Giftpollen zu Boden.

Il possède des pétales énormes. À chaque pas,
ils sèment d’épais nuages de pollen toxique.

세계에서 제일 큰 꽃잎은
걸을 때마다 흔들려 대량의
독 꽃가루를 흩뿌린다.

せかいいち　おおきな　はなびらは
あるくたびに　ゆれて　たいりょうの
どくかふんを　ばらまいてしまう。

花びらが　大きいほど
たくさん　花粉を　出すが
頭が　重たくて　疲れてしまうという。

The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it
contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

Più grandi sono i petali, maggiore è la quantità di
polline tossico che contengono. La testa è
molto pesante.

Cuanto mayores son sus pétalos, más tóxico es su
polen. Le pesa la cabeza y le cuesta mantenerla
erguida.

Je größer die Blütenblätter, desto mehr giftige
Pollen sind in der Blüte enthalten.

Plus ses pétales sont grands, plus ils contiennent de
pollen toxique.

꽃잎이 클수록 많은
꽃가루를 만들어 내지만 머리가
무거워서 지쳐버린다고 한다.

はなびらが　おおきいほど　たくさん
かふんを　だすが　あたまが
おもたくて　つかれてしまうという。

Its petals are the largest in the
world. As it walks, it scatters
extremely allergenic pollen.

Its petals are the largest in the
world. As it walks, it scatters
extremely allergenic pollen.

Its petals are the largest in the
world. As it walks, it scatters
extremely allergenic pollen.

Ses pétales sont les plus grands
du monde. Il marche en répandant
un pollen extrêmement allergène.

Its petals are the largest in the
world. As it walks, it scatters
extremely allergenic pollen.

Ses pétales sont les plus grands
du monde. Il marche en répandant
un pollen extrêmement allergène.

The bud bursts into bloom with a
bang. It then starts scattering
allergenic, poisonous pollen.

It has the world’s largest petals.
With every step, the petals shake
out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

Its petals are the largest in the
world. As it walks, it scatters
extremely allergenic pollen.

Its petals are the largest in the
world. As it walks, it scatters
extremely allergenic pollen.

Its petals are the largest in the
world. As it walks, it scatters
extremely allergenic pollen.

The larger its petals, the more toxic
pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy
and hard to hold up.

Its petals are the largest in the world.
It fiendishly scatters allergy-causing
pollen from its petals.

In seasons when it produces more pollen,
the air around a VILEPLUME turns yellow
with the powder as it walks. The pollen is
highly toxic and causes paralysis.

VILEPLUME has the world’s largest
petals. They are used to attract prey
that are then doused with toxic spores. Once the prey are immobilized, this
POKéMON catches and devours them.

VILEPLUME’s toxic pollen triggers
atrocious allergy attacks. That’s why
it is advisable never to approach any attractive flowers in a jungle, however
pretty they may be.

By shaking its big
petals, it scat­
ters toxic pollen into the air,
turning the air
yellow.

The bud bursts
into bloom with a
bang. It then starts scattering
allergenic, poi­
sonous pollen.

It has the world's
largest petals.
With every step, the petals shake
out heavy clouds
of toxic pollen.

Flaps its broad
flower petals to
scatter its poisonous pollen.
The flapping sound
is very loud.

The larger its
petals, the more
toxic pollen it contains. Its big
head is heavy and
hard to hold up.

The larger its
petals, the more
toxic pollen it contains. Its big
head is heavy and
hard to hold up.
